title: Carpenters with the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra
url: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carpenters with the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra
text:
Carpenters with the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra is a compilation album by American duo the Carpenters. It was released on 7 December 2018, by A&M Records and Universal Music Enterprises. The album features Carpenters' "original vocal and instrumental tracks" accompanied by new orchestral arrangements by the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra. Richard Carpenter served as the album's producer, arranger and conductor.
The Target store exclusive CD and the Japanese release has "Please Mr. Postman" as a bonus track.


== Track listing ==
All tracks arranged by Richard Carpenter; except "I Believe You" arranged by Paul Riser.
